scripts.dev: npm run build:api && concurrently "node apps/api/dist/index.js" "npm run dev --prefix apps/web"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix apps/api" "npm run dev --prefix apps/web"
scripts.dev:compiled: npm run build:api && concurrently "node apps/api/dist/index.js" "npm run dev --prefix apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix apps/api && npm run build --prefix apps/web
